What challenge does EvoMIL face when pre: Diversity of viruses and fewer proteins per virus
Inability to process large protein sequences
High mutation rates in viral genomes
What future direction is suggested to im: Integrating host information to extend the model's applicability
Increasing the size of viral protein datasets
What is the role of the spike protein in: It is crucial for host interaction and contains the receptor-binding domain essential for cell entry.
It is responsible for viral replication within the host cell.
It acts as a decoy to evade the host immune system.
It is involved in the assembly of new viral particles.
